external_games.name: Train Simulator: BR DP1 Deltic Loco Add-On

name: Train Simulator: BR DP1 Deltic Loco Add-On
summary: The powerful and impressive BR DP1 Deltic evokes the UK's glorious railway heritage, and this attractive prototype diesel locomotive is now available for Train Simulator. The amalgamation of engine manufacturer Napier & Sons and locomotive builder English Electric in 1942 opened up the potential to use the powerful Napier Deltic...
